official_title: A bill to extend and amend programs under the Native American Programs Act of 1974, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Native American Programs Act of 1974 to authorize appropriations for FY 1985 through 1987. Authorizes financial assistance to private entities for projects which promote economic and social self-sufficiency for Native Americans.

titles.title: A bill to extend and amend programs under the Native American Programs Act of 1974, and for other purposes.
